title: grass_cutting_midday_fieldwork
summary: Midday grass cutting work under direct sunlight at MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit records real agricultural labor activity involving grass cutting performed under strong midday sunlight at MaMeeFarm. The observation documents physical fieldwork conditions, environmental exposure, and on-site labor as part of routine farm maintenance.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for inspection convenience only and does not function as a cryptographic anchor within the DGCP verification chain.
